General.Name: Hangzhou Great Star Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Greatstar Industrial Co., Ltd operates in tool hardware industry in China and internationally. The company engages in the research, development, production, and sale of hand tools and power tools, laser measurement, storage cabinets, and power stations, as well as personal protective equipment. Its products are used for family housing maintenance, construction engineering, vehicle maintenance, surveying and mapping, home energy management, etc. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
